prompts: Create a Pokemon that embodies joy and happiness, with a round body and big eyes.
I want a cute, pink Pokemon that carries an egg, resembling a guardian figure.
Generate a friendly-looking Pokemon with fluffy features and a nurturing presence.
Make a Pokemon that exudes cuteness, with soft colors and gentle expressions.
Imagine a healing-type Pokemon that looks like a cuddly creature with magical properties.
Design a Pokemon that represents care and comfort, with large, comforting wings.
Show me a blissful Pokemon that thrives in urban settings, making friends everywhere.
